name: Thunder Krumper
description:
Thunder Krumper, the game about fish, clones and AI.

Guide your clones through the water, don't hit the kill clone blocks, or else bye-bye clone. You also might want to avoid breaking your clone depot, then you can't clone.

Hopefully one day I finish it, after all, I only worked for a total of 3 hours

Have fun playing my awful game! Enjoy!
